dc:title: CPIC CYP2D6 Codeine Recommendations
dc:description: Provides codeine therapy recommendations based on CYP2D6 phenotype per the CPIC guidelines

schema:creator.schema:affiliation: Knowledge Systems Lab, University of Michigan Medical School

koio:hasKnowledge.dc:description: This guideline recommends prescribing of codeine for the CYP2D6 phenotype. The guideline has an 'A' level of evidence, indicating that the preponderance of evidence is high or moderate in favor of changing prescribing.

hasTest.dc:title: Knowledge Tests (Python)
hasTest.dc:description: These tests are written to test knowledge function for CYP2D6 Codeine Recommendation.

hasService.dc:description: A JavaScript/Python library with a function that accepts a phenotype and provide drug dosing recommendations.

hasTest.dc:title: Service Tests (JavaScript)
hasTest.dc:description: These tests are written to test the functionality and correctness of the JavaScript library service.

hasTest.dc:title: Service Tests (Python)
hasTest.dc:description: These tests are written to test the functionality and correctness of the Python library service.
